content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to ride a bicycle on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct} between #{time_range}.
To prove my commitment, I will send a selfie of myself on a bicycle each day I’ve committed.
This is my promise to myself — to keep moving, breathe deeper, and enjoy the ride. 🚴‍♂️📸

basicQuest.title: Ride a Bicycle
basicQuest.description:
Your bike isn’t just a machine — it’s freedom on two wheels. Riding clears the mind, strengthens the body, and brings out your inner explorer.

Hop on. Feel the wind. Chase a sunset. Whether it’s for fitness, fun, or focus — every ride brings you closer to balance.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a selfie of a person on a bicycle
